net.tfobz.vokabeltrainer.model

Class VokabeltrainerDB

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.tfobz.vokabeltrainer.model.VokabeltrainerDB

  • public class VokabeltrainerDB
extends java.lang.Object
    Utility class for accessing an HsqlDB database. The hsqldb.jar archive must be included in the application's classpath. The archive can be found at http://hsqldb.org/ This class provides methods to create, read, update, and delete (CRUD) operations for vocabulary training, including managing learning card decks, subjects, and cards.
    Author:

    • Method Detail

      • mainn

        public static void mainn(java.lang.String[] args)
        Demonstrates how to use the VokabeltrainerDB class to access the database. This main method retrieves all learning decks, their subjects, and a random card from the first subject of the first deck.
        Parameters:
        args - Command-line arguments (not used).

      • erstellenTabellen

        public static void erstellenTabellen()
        Creates the necessary tables in the database if they do not already exist. Additionally, inserts a default settings record. Note: This method writes a record to the settings table.

      • loeschenTabellen

        protected static void loeschenTabellen()
        Deletes all existing tables from the database. This method removes settings, cards, subjects, and learning decks tables.

      • hinzufuegenTestdaten

        protected static void hinzufuegenTestdaten()
        Adds test data to the database tables. This includes inserting predefined learning decks, subjects, and cards for initial testing purposes.

      • getConnection

        public static java.sql.Connection getConnection()
                                         throws java.sql.SQLException
        Establishes and returns a connection to the HSQLDB database.
        Returns:
        A Connection object to the database.
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - If a database access error occurs or the driver is not found.

      • getLernkartei

        public static Lernkartei getLernkartei(int nummerLernkartei)
        Retrieves the learning deck with the specified number from the database.
        Parameters:
        nummerLernkartei - The number of the learning deck.
        Returns:
        The Lernkartei object if found, otherwise null.

      • getLernkarteien

        public static java.util.List<Lernkartei> getLernkarteien()
        Retrieves a list of all learning decks from the database.
        Returns:
        A list of Lernkartei objects, or null if a database error occurs.

      • getFaecher

        public static java.util.List<Fach> getFaecher(int nummerLernkartei)
        Retrieves the subjects associated with a specific learning deck.
        Parameters:
        nummerLernkartei - The number of the learning deck.
        Returns:
        A list of Fach objects, or null if the learning deck does not exist or a database error occurs.

                           int nummerFach)
        Searches for a subject with the specified number within a given learning deck.
        Parameters:
        nummerLernkartei - The number of the learning deck.
        nummerFach - The number of the subject.
        Returns:
        The Fach object if found, otherwise null.

      • getFach

        public static Fach getFach(int nummerFach)
        Searches for a subject with the specified number.
        Parameters:
        nummerFach - The number of the subject.
        Returns:
        The Fach object if found, otherwise null.

      • getZufaelligeKarte

        public static Karte getZufaelligeKarte(int nummerLernkartei,
                                       int nummerFach)
        Retrieves a random card from the specified subject within the given learning deck. Note: Does not record that learning occurred on this subject today.
        Parameters:
        nummerLernkartei - The number of the learning deck.
        nummerFach - The number of the subject.
        Returns:
        The Karte object if found, otherwise null.

      • getKarte

        public static Karte getKarte(int nummerKarte)
        Retrieves the card with the specified number.
        Parameters:
        nummerKarte - The number of the card.
        Returns:
        The Karte object if found, otherwise null.

      • setKarteRichtig

        public static int setKarteRichtig(Karte karte)
        Moves a card to the next subject and records that learning occurred in the learning deck.
        Parameters:
        karte - The card to be marked as correct.
        Returns:
        0 if successful, -1 if the card could not be saved or a database error occurred, -2 if there is no subject after the current subject.

      • setKarteFalsch

        public static int setKarteFalsch(Karte karte)
        Moves a card to the first subject of the learning deck and records that learning occurred.
        Parameters:
        karte - The card to be marked as incorrect.
        Returns:
        0 if successful, -1 if the card could not be saved or a database error occurred.

      • hinzufuegenFach

        public static int hinzufuegenFach(int nummerLernkartei,
                                  Fach fach)
        Adds a new subject to the specified learning deck. The subject is appended at the end. If the learned date is not set, it defaults to the current date. If the subject description is not provided, it defaults to "Subject ".
        Parameters:
        nummerLernkartei - The number of the learning deck.
        fach - The Fach object to be added.
        Returns:
        -1 if the learning deck does not exist or the subject already exists.

      • aendernFach

        public static int aendernFach(Fach fach)
        Updates the contents of an existing subject. Only the description, reminder interval, and learned date can be changed.
        Parameters:
        fach - The Fach object with updated information.
        Returns:
        -1 if the subject does not exist or a database error occurred, -2 if validation errors occurred.

      • hinzufuegenLernkartei

        public static int hinzufuegenLernkartei(Lernkartei lernkartei)
        Adds a new learning deck to the database. The deck receives the number assigned by the database.
        Parameters:
        lernkartei - The Lernkartei object to be added.
        Returns:
        -1 if a database error occurred, -2 if validation errors occurred or a deck with the same description already exists.

      • aendernLernkartei

        public static int aendernLernkartei(Lernkartei lernkartei)
        Updates an existing learning deck in the database.
        Parameters:
        lernkartei - The Lernkartei object with updated information.
        Returns:
        -1 if the deck does not exist or a database error occurred, -2 if validation errors occurred or a deck with the same description already exists.

      • loeschenLernkartei

        public static int loeschenLernkartei(int nummerLernkartei)
        Deletes the specified learning deck from the database, including all associated subjects and cards.
        Parameters:
        nummerLernkartei - The number of the learning deck to be deleted.
        Returns:
        -1 if the deck was not found or a database error occurred, 0 if successful.

      • hinzufuegenKarte

        public static int hinzufuegenKarte(int nummerLernkartei,
                                   Karte karte)
        Adds a new card to the first subject of the specified learning deck. The card receives the number assigned by the database.
        Parameters:
        nummerLernkartei - The number of the learning deck.
        karte - The Karte object to be added.
        Returns:
        -1 if a database error occurred, -2 if the card is incomplete, -3 if the learning deck does not exist, -4 if no subjects exist in the learning deck, -5 if a duplicate card already exists in any subject of the learning deck.

      • aendernKarte

        public static int aendernKarte(Karte karte)
        Updates the words of an existing card. Other properties of the card cannot be changed. The card remains in the same subject.
        Parameters:
        karte - The Karte object with updated words.
        Returns:
        -1 if the card does not exist or a database error occurred, -2 if the card is incomplete, -4 if a duplicate card with the same contents already exists in any subject.

      • loeschenKarte

        public static int loeschenKarte(int nummerKarte)
        Deletes the card with the specified number from the database.
        Parameters:
        nummerKarte - The number of the card to be deleted.
        Returns:
        -1 if a database error occurred or the card was not found, 0 if successful.

      • loeschenAlleFaecher

        public static int loeschenAlleFaecher(int nummerLernkartei)
        Deletes all subjects and associated cards from the specified learning deck.
        Parameters:
        nummerLernkartei - The number of the learning deck.
        Returns:
        -1 if a database error occurred or the learning deck was not found, 0 if successful.

      • getLernkarteienErinnerung

        public static java.util.List<Lernkartei> getLernkarteienErinnerung()
        Retrieves a list of all learning decks that have subjects with expired reminders. A reminder is considered expired if the difference between today's date and the last learned date is greater than or equal to the reminder interval. Also includes decks that have subjects where learning has never occurred. Subjects with a reminder interval of 0 are ignored.
        Returns:
        A list of Lernkartei objects with expired reminders, or null if a database error occurs.

      • getFaecherErinnerung

        public static java.util.List<Fach> getFaecherErinnerung(int nummerLernkartei)
        Retrieves subjects with expired reminders from the specified learning deck.
        Parameters:
        nummerLernkartei - The number of the learning deck.
        Returns:
        A list of Fach objects with expired reminders, or null if the deck does not exist or a database error occurs.

      • getKarten

        public static java.util.ArrayList<Karte> getKarten(int nummerFach)
        Retrieves all cards from the specified subject.
        Parameters:
        nummerFach - The number of the subject.
        Returns:
        A list of Karte objects, or null if the subject does not exist or a database error occurs.

      • importierenKarten

        public static int importierenKarten(int nummerLernkartei,
                                    java.lang.String pfad)
        Imports cards into the specified learning deck from a file. If the deck already has subjects and cards, they are deleted before importing. Supported formats include: Without subjects: Haus; house Strauch; shrub Zaun; fence Garten; Garden Ziegel; brick Schornstein; chimney With subjects: Haus; house; 0 Strauch; shrub; 1 Zaun; fence; 0 Garten; Garden; 1 Ziegel; brick; 2 Schornstein; chimney; 1 In the second format, the third column indicates the association with subjects, which are also newly created. Duplicate cards are not imported.
        Parameters:
        nummerLernkartei - The number of the learning deck.
        pfad - The file path to import from.
        Returns:
        -1 if an import error occurred, -2 if the file was not found, -3 if the learning deck does not exist.

      • exportierenKarten

        public static int exportierenKarten(int nummerLernkartei,
                                    java.lang.String pfad,
                                    boolean mitFaechern)
        Exports all cards from the specified learning deck to a text file, optionally including subject numbers.
        Parameters:
        nummerLernkartei - The number of the learning deck.
        pfad - The file path to export to.
        mitFaechern - Whether to include subject numbers in the export.
        Returns:
        -1 if a database or file writing error occurred, -3 if the learning deck does not exist, 0 if successful.

      • getEinstellungenStandardLernkartei

        public static Lernkartei getEinstellungenStandardLernkartei()
        Retrieves the learning deck set as the default, which is used when opening the application.
        Returns:
        The default Lernkartei object, or null if a database error occurred or no default is set.

      • setEinstellungenStandardLernkartei

        public static int setEinstellungenStandardLernkartei(int nummerLernkartei)
        Sets the specified learning deck as the default learning deck. If -1 is passed, the default setting is cleared.
        Parameters:
        nummerLernkartei - The number of the learning deck to set as default, or -1 to clear.
        Returns:
        -1 if the learning deck was not found or a database error occurred, 0 if successful.

      • setEinstellungenLernkarteienMitErinnerung

        public static int setEinstellungenLernkarteienMitErinnerung(boolean lernkarteienMitErinnerung)
        Sets whether the user wants to study only in learning decks with expired reminders.
        Parameters:
        lernkarteienMitErinnerung - True to enable, false to disable.
        Returns:
        -1 if a database error occurred, 0 if successful.

      • getEinstellungenLernkarteienMitErinnerung

        public static boolean getEinstellungenLernkarteienMitErinnerung()
        Retrieves whether the user has set to study only in learning decks with expired reminders.
        Returns:
        True if enabled, false otherwise or if no setting has been made.

      • getActualDate

        protected static java.lang.String getActualDate()

      • getDateOneDayBeforeToday

        protected static java.util.Date getDateOneDayBeforeToday()

      • convertToString

        public static java.lang.String convertToString(java.util.Date date)
        Converts a Date object to a string in the format "yyyy-MM-dd".
        Parameters:
        date - The Date object to convert.
        Returns:
        The formatted date string, or "NULL" if the date is null.

      • getKartenFromLernkartei

        public static java.util.List<Karte> getKartenFromLernkartei(int nummerLernkartei)
        Retrieves all cards from the specified learning deck.
        Parameters:
        nummerLernkartei - The number of the learning deck.
        Returns:
        A list of Karte objects, or null if a database error occurs.

      • getKartenUndBoxenVonLernkartei

        public static java.util.List<Karte> getKartenUndBoxenVonLernkartei(int nummerLernkartei)
        Retrieves all cards and their associated subjects from the specified learning deck.
        Parameters:
        nummerLernkartei - The number of the learning deck.
        Returns:
        A list of Karte objects with associated subject information, or null if a database error occurs.
